recipesJson.name: Creamy corn bread pudding
recipesJson.author: jpsublime921
recipesJson.description:
***FA Custard is FA Premium Custard

Updated- added 1% more Corn Bread, and added 1% Premium Custard for some texture/thicker vape. Creamy Cornbread Pudding. Inspired by Country Clouds Cornbread Pudding. Iâ€™ve over thought this recipe many times. I kept it as simple as possible and stuck to the profile with this. Definitely not a clone but it is darn tasty.

reviews.text: Vaped after 10 days steeping: This is the best Corn Bread for me, because there is no Maple inside. Maybe that lacks the authentic profile of a Corn Bread, but this is a yummy, round Corn Bread Mix.
Mixed in May 8th. The past week, I have had this in my ADV rotation, definitely very delicious. Great job.

Definitely digging this one. The only thing I want to see is a little more corn bread. Because it seems to be more of complex custard than a corn bread to me. But delicious non the less. I plan on playing around with it a little bit to see if I can bring the corn a little more forward.
